Hawke’s Bay: Man airlifted to hospital after Ngāruroro River boating incident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-man-airlifted-to-hospital-after-ngaruroro-river-boating-incident/L43C24F4NFDDJAA72M7PE7GC5U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-man-airlifted-to-hospital-after-ngaruroro-river-boating-incident/L43C24F4NFDDJAA72M7PE7GC5U/ Michaela GowerA man has been left in a serious condition after boating incident on the Hawke's Bay river Mon, 20 Jan 2025 02:56:03 +0000 The man was flown from Ngāruroro River to Hastings Hospital in nine minutes.
